DOC.HEAD: With AM-Auto Layoffs
DOC.TEXT: Here is a list of car and truck assembly plants that will temporarily stop production in January because of growing inventories and slow demand. The location of the plant is followed by the approximate number of hourly employees and the length of shutdown as provided this week by the automakers. All are car plants unless otherwise specified.
